Prometheus Interpolation Documentation
==========================================

A simple tool to interpolate ECCC grib data to a specified point. Data comes from `https://eccc-msc.github.io/msc-animet`.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   define_vars
   python_environment

* :ref:`search`
